channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Morning Minute: It's a New Dawn, It's a New Day...
I’m Done Lamenting; You Should Be Too. Make 2026 a Year of Reforming Over Mourning
Critics warn Minnesota legislation now taking effect is setting up the 'next billion-dollar fraud'
item.description: Minnesota paid leave law takes effect Jan. 1, granting workers up to 20 weeks of benefits, but critics say the program could be exploited for fraud.

item.title: Black Republican calls for total, permanent abolition of DEI: 'I want to earn every opportunity on merit'
item.description: Black Republican U.S. Rep. Wesley Hunt of Texas called for the full and permanent abolition of diversity, equity, and inclusion ideology.

item.title: Watch: Solemn Moment of Silence at Sydney's Iconic New Year's Fireworks Event to Ring in 2026

item.description: NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's progressive agenda includes city-owned grocery stores, free buses and rent freezes, testing ambitious policies.
